system.description:
You never need to pay a price when facing a Threat to the World. You can also @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YE99aLoamM4pDgT7]{Command Lore} about the various prophecies and legends about you, letting us know more details as they become important.

You gain the Doom stat at +2, if you did not have it.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} by relying on fate or luck, roll +Doom. On a 10+, their fate is sealed. The Overlord player decides what happens to them.
